definition: to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate
to present to a superior/memorial/petition/to present (a certain appearance)/to assume (a shape)/to be (a certain color)

sentences.english: Global warming caused a dryer and warmer climate in the centeral part of Qinghai-Tibet plateau.
sentences.chinese: 受全球變暖影響，青藏高原氣候呈現出暖幹趨勢。

sentences.english: Fine texture, uniform color-make-up to show you natural luster, and the makeup is not easily come off.
sentences.chinese: 質地細緻，上色均勻，不易脫妝，妝效呈現自然光澤。

sentences.english: Search results will also automatically when you search in the Omnibox.
sentences.chinese: 當你在搜索框內搜索時，結果也將是自動呈現。

sentences.english: Light the degree of coloring for object is called color rendering.
sentences.chinese: 光源對於物體顏色呈現的程度稱爲顯色性。

sentences.english: The avocado shows a typical loss of green color and a reduction in vegetative growth.
sentences.chinese: 鱷梨呈現典型的葉色褪綠及營養生長減弱。

sentences.english: Images of winter trees have no leaves and white backgrounds because of the snow.
sentences.chinese: 冬天的樹圖沒有葉子，而且因爲雪呈現白色的背景。

sentences.english: But after that period, the tea economy is in the recession.
sentences.chinese: 但自唐中後期以後，茶業經濟逐步呈現出衰退趨勢。

sentences.english: Self-publishing these days is increasingly a tale of two cities.
sentences.chinese: 今自助出版越來越呈現兩極分化的趨勢。

sentences.english: After optimization your pages will appear to snap onto the screen.
sentences.chinese: 在優化之後，你的頁面會快速的呈現在屏幕上。

sentences.english: The larger the font size is, the easier it is for readers to actually read the text presented on a given web-page.
sentences.chinese: 字體越大，讀者越容易看到呈現在網頁上的內容。

sentences.english: Classic German-style flavor, a perfect cherry and strawberry cake.
sentences.chinese: 徳式傳統經典風味，酒釀櫻桃的完美呈現。

sentences.english: Several factors lead to this downward spiral of the unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 幾大因素使得失業狀況呈現螺旋形惡化。

sentences.english: Yad entrance mine market both showed a high consolidation positive trend.
sentences.chinese: 連日來進口礦市場皆呈現出高位盤整向上的趨勢。

sentences.english: Sunlight reflecting off the water’s surface gives it a pale, silvery blue color.
sentences.chinese: 水面上太陽光反射讓水面呈現出銀白藍色。

sentences.english: Each row of the dataTable represents an address.
sentences.chinese: 數據表的每一行呈現一個地址。

sentences.english: Fourth, the traditional social philosophy is pluralistic in its values.
sentences.chinese: 傳統處世哲學在價值層面呈現著多元取向。

definition: to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
(of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer
to show/to show off/to display/to manifest/expression/manifestation/show/display/performance (at work etc)/behavior
to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
to restore to the original state/to reconstruct (an event)/reduction (chemistry)
